value.stringValue: {!$Record.CaseNumber} Follow up case has been created. Please assign resources to the case.

Flow.description: Handover DLP case creation changes PMA Reactive, New Sale, Post DLP CHANGES

formulas.name: fml_NotficationBody
formulas.expression: 'Case: '+ {!$Record.CaseNumber} +' have been updated. Please check new changes.'

formulas.name: Var_Queue_Formula
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Unit__r.DLPZone__r.ContractorDLPStatus__c} == 'Active', 'DLP Queue', IF({!$Record.Unit__r.DLPZone__r.ContractorDLPStatus__c} != 'Active' && {!$Record.CustomerDLPStatus__c} == 'Active', 'Active Customer DLP', IF({!$Record.Unit__r.DLPZone__r.ContractorDLPStatus__c} != 'Active' && {!$Record.CustomerDLPStatus__c} != 'Active' && {!$Record.SalesOrder__r.PMAStatus__c} == 'Active', 'PMA Reactive Queue', 'Post DLP Queue')))

Flow.label: FSL Case Trigger

start.filterLogic: (9 AND ((1 AND 3) OR ((2 AND 3 AND 4 ) OR (5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 10) ))) OR (9 AND 11)
